{{nihongo|'''Takashi Usami'''|å®ä½ç¾ è²´å²|Usami Takashi|born 6 May 1992}} is a [[Japanese people|Japanese]] [[association football|footballer]] who plays for [[FC Bayern Munich|Bayern Munich]] on loan from [[Gamba Osaka]]. He plays as a [[attacking midfielder]], [[second striker]] or [[Forward (association football)|winger]].
==Club career== ===Gamba Osaka=== Usami made history by making his professional debut for [[Gamba Osaka]] at the age of 17 years and 14 days and scoring a goal in the same match to become the youngest player to achieve both feats for the club, breaking the records previously set by [[Junichi Inamoto]]. Usami made his professional debut and goal on 20 May 2009 against [[FC Seoul]] in the [[2009 AFC Champions League|Champions League]].<ref>{{cite news|url=http://www.soccerway.com/matches/2009/05/20/asia/afc-champions-league/gamba-osaka/fc-seoul/735975/|title=Gamba Osaka vs. Seoul 1 - 2|date=20 May 2009|accessdate=6 June 2011|work=Soccerway}}</ref> In 2010, he became a more regular face in the Gamba Osaka team and he was named as [[J. League Rookie of the Year|Best Young Player]] by the J. League at the annual awards ceremony on December 6.<ref>{{cite news|url=http://www.j-league.or.jp/awards/index.html|title=ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ªãªã¼ã°ã¢ã¦ã©ã¼ãº|date=6 December 2010|accessdate=22 April 2011|work=[[J. League]]|language=Japanese}}</ref>
===Bayern Munich=== On 27 June 2011 it was confirmed that Usami would be loaned out to [[FC Bayern Munich|Bayern Munich]],<ref>{{cite news|url=http://www.fifa.com/worldfootball/clubfootball/news/newsid=1462047.html|title=Bayern take Usami on loan|date=27 June 2011|accessdate=27 June 2011|work=[[FIFA.com]]}}</ref> with an option to buy next summer. He joined the team in mid-July. Usami told in a news conference that a chance like that did not come everyday, and that he is looking forward to this big challenge. When he was asked about Bayern's current first-team players, he said: "I want to improve my skills to the point I can take their places." Usami scored his first goal for FC Bayern on 26 October 2011 in the DFB Cup against Ingolstadt where he came off the bench in 73 minute.<ref>{{cite news|url=http://www.fcbayern.telekom.de/de/aktuell/news/2011/29925.php|title=FCB leiht Japaner Usami aus|date=27 June 2011|accessdate=27 June 2011|work=[[FC Bayern Munich|Bayern Munich]]|language=German}}</ref>
